description:
Unique Creations Software is an integrated ICT solution development organisation established in the USA,
India and in the Middle East.
UCS focuses on software development and banks on its partners for the associated hardware subsystems required for solving the challenges and problems of its esteemed customers.Unique Creations Software (UCS) is offering smart ICT solutions to small, medium and large enterprises across the globe. Consistent investment in our products, people and culture ensures meeting the quality expectation of our esteemed customers. Innovation and customer experience are two of the cornerstones on which our business is built successfully.
Our software solutions enable our customers to meet their stringent requirements with a high emphasis on meeting their expectations on functionality, quality and performance.
As Unique Creations is a privately held and independent company, we have the flexibility to make decisions quickly to adopt a long-term strategy for the development of our business.
An example of this flexibility is our decision to invest in developing products and solutions like UCSmart, UC-School, UC-Shoppe and UC-Track.
